title: Polarman

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- All players are in a circle with radius 1, with player #1 at the top and the other players all evenly spaced around it. Host can figure out the math.
- All visits are vectors travelling between the visitor and the target.
- You will learn the magnitude of your first target's vector and the angle of your second's.
- __**Part of the Daily Streak faction**__

desc:
Post 4701
*are you a vector or a scalar*
